quest.name: The Meeting of Minds
journal: Qih Aliapoh has been eagerly awaiting your return.

Qih thanks you for all your hard work and informs you that someone is very keen to talk with you at Learners' Meet. You agree to hear them out and head off to find out just who is so interested in chatting with you.

Soon after you arrive at Learners' Meet, you find yourself face-to-face with none other than the scholarch himself. Montichaigne asks if you would be willing to sound out those you helped about sharing their findings with one another. You agree to lend a hand and set off to go and see your old friends once more.

Rurusha is more than happy to accept your invitation, causing Boric to be overcome with emotion upon realizing she is finally getting the recognition she deserves. Jude, however, seems unsure if he is deserving of your invite at first, but eventually concedes this is a perfect opportunity to showcase the starlens. After broaching the subject with Debroye, she is overjoyed to be presented with another chance to show the world just how delicious Mervynbread can be. Upon speaking with you, Hinageshi realizes she and Tankin are yet to hold their reception. She excitedly muses about taking advantage of this opportunity to honor her marriage to the professor as you take your leave. T'laqa Tia happily accepts your proposal as he is keen to keep pushing ahead to do justice to his mentor's legacy. Having spoken to everyone, you head back to Searchers' Meet to inform Qih that all will be in attendance.
Qih informs you that she has been instructed by the scholarch to treat you to a meal at the Last Stand. Feeling rather peckish, you excitedly make your way to the restaurant.

Your meal at the Last Stand is interrupted by a wayward Loporrit─Searchingway. He came to Etheirys seeking out new and exciting discoveries, and Qih's mention of the upcoming gathering sparks his interest. His attendance would require permission from Montichaigne, however, so the three of you make for Learners' Meet to see if the scholarch can be persuaded.

The scholarch finds a kindred spirit in Searchingway and gladly allows him to sit in on the meeting. The Loporrit is enthralled by all the presentations, but remains curious as to how such differing disciplines can be combined to achieve a common goal. You suggest they explore new possibilities with their newly gained knowledge, and inspire the group to dream bigger yet in the process. With proceedings having come to a close, you make tracks for Searchers' Meet once more.

Qih remarks that even she is excited by the prospect of one day exploring the great expanse. She is altogether less happy, however, when she realizes she never got the chance to stroke Searchingway's silky soft fur.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename! Just who I was looking for.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I wished to thank you for helping the students and staff from the various faculties.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Their work has become the talk of the Studium! You've made a real difference.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Actually, while you're here, there's a pressing matter I wished to discuss.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Having heard the many glowing accounts of your work, another official of the Studium has requested an audience. Would you be able to spare time to speak with him?

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Wonderful. Then let us head to Learners' Meet.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: He should arrive any moment now. Let's take a seat.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: (-???-)My apologies for keeping you waiting.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Before we proceed, I wish to extend my sincerest thanks on behalf of the Studium for all you have done to aid our faculty and students.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: By the sounds of it, they have made remarkable findings one and all. That is why I would hold an assembly that we might discuss the overarching impact of their research.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Such gatherings are how academia evolves and advances─the shared knowledge of our works, be they successes or failures, that all may strive to improve.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Precisely. Knowledge begets knowledge. Amassing and combining findings from a host of fields often leads to the creation of entirely new disciplines—one of the very reasons for which the Studium was founded.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Which brings me to the reason why I asked you here. Might I prevail upon you to speak with the faculty and invite them to this meeting?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It would be my pleasure.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Is there no one else who can ask them?

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Excellent! I can think of no one better suited to the task. You were, after all, a key factor in all their successes.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: I thought to speak with them myself, but I do not wish for them to think attendance compulsory. And an invitation from you is less likely to be perceived as an order.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Splendid. You have my thanks.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Well, that's that then. And you needn't rush to deliver these invitations. Pray speak with the faculty and students in your own time.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: When you've finished, return here and I will see to readying a chamber for the meeting.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Well, well, look who it is! To what do I owe the pleasure?

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Oh, that sounds lovely!

dialogue.name: BORIC
dialogue.text: At long last your research will receive the recognition it deserves. Oh, Professor... <sniffle>

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Oh, Boric, stop. I understand how you feel, but this is no time for tears.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Professor Namono will wish to attend as well, like as not. I'll have a word with him, and see if we can't prepare a suitable compilation of our works.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. I must admit, I did not expect to see you here again.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: I see... I have certainly heard of such events, though I never dared dream a student such as myself would be invited to one.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Don't tell me you're getting cold feet already! The Jude I know would relish such a challenge.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Perhaps you're right, Jeromere. This would be the perfect opportunity to demonstrate what a boon the starlens could be to the academic community!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: All right, then. Jeromere and I will set to work preparing a presentation at once.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Forename! What a pleasant surprise. Would you care for a quick meal at the Last Stand to commemorate our reunion?

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Well, that sounds wonderful!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: It would be an honor to attend. I may never have a better opportunity to inform my peers of the benefits of fine dining.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Perhaps I will invite Professor Galveroche and a few employees from the Last Stand to prepare samples of Mervynbread for those in attendance.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: In any case, there is much I must do to prepare. Until then, Forename!

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: Forename! It's so good to see you.

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: Lest you wonder, Professor Tankin and I are doing quite well. But to what do we owe the pleasure of your visit?

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: Is that so? I suppose the professor and I could share what we've learned from the various cultures we emulated.

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: Come to think of it, we've yet to share the news of our union either. The proposal was so sudden, we scarcely had time to invite any of the faculty, let alone hold a reception. All the more reason we should attend.

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: We will be there, absolutely! Professor Tankin should be most glad to hear about this.

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: My, what a surprise! Don't tell me─you've come with a souvenir from some far-flung land?

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: Oho! First I am promoted to tenured professor, then this momentous opportunity presents itself to me.

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: Of course I shall attend. Were it not for you, I never would have proven my theory, and I would be a fool to overlook a chance to present my findings.

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: Yes, a bold first step in honoring Professor Nele's legacy.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: When all parties have been informed, return here and I will see to reserving a space for the assembly.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: Goodness me, I haven't been this excited for an assembly in ages.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: There's still much we must do to prepare, but worry not─we will be ready!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: I've no doubt the other faculty and students will be quite pleased to see what we have to share.

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: The professor and I shouldn't be much longer.

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: I daresay even Professor Nele would be impressed were he here to see what I have planned.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Welcome back! Well, what did they say?

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Very good. They have all worked so very hard, it is heartening to see their efforts will be rewarded.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: The assembly will be held at Aporia in Labyrinthos. I've no doubt they would all be glad for your attendance, so please do stop by if you have time.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Oh, before I forget, the scholarch requested you be treated to a meal at the Last Stand as thanks for your help. As there's still time before they're set to begin, would you care to go now?

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: To the Last Stand, then.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I hope you don't mind, but I've already ordered for the both of us. The meal was meant to be for you alone, but I'm sure the scholarch will forgive me for partaking of his generosity.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: It's true! My sister has the diet of a savage. Naught but rock-hard bread and wildflowers day in and day out.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-Familiar Face-)Forgive the interruption, but...have we met? I swear you're the spitting image of one of those intrepid adventurers that visited the moon.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Aha! I knew it. The name's Searchingway, by the way. Seeker of knowledge and all things curious.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: A Loporrit! My, if you aren't the most adorable creature. Forgive me, but I cannot help but notice how wonderfully fuzzy your ears are. May I...?

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Again with my ears. Honestly, what is it with you people and... <sigh> Very well. You may rub my ears, but I must insist on something in exchange.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Hmm... Well, some of our finest academics will soon be gathering at Aporia. I've no doubt they have curious and otherwise intriguing things to talk about.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: I see... May I ask the reason for this meeting of minds?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To share their research.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To see who's the smartest in the Studium.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Erm...perhaps further explanation is in order.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: The greatest minds of Etheirys come together to share heretofore unknown knowledge? That really does sound intriguing! And you'd allow me to observe this gathering?

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: You would first need permission from Scholarch Montichaigne, but─

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Then what are we waiting for? Where is this Scholard Monty-chu?

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: It's Scholarch Montichaigne, and please bear in mind there is a chance he may refuse you. Still, I see no harm in asking. If you would go to Learners' Meet, I will have him to meet us there.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Splendid! Let's hop to it, then!

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Right, well I had better go and─hold on a moment! I never got to rub his ears!

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Ah, Qih and Forename. What is it you wish to discuss?

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Searchingway here is very keen to attend the forthcoming meeting you've arranged with the faculty and students.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: I came to Etheirys in search of the curious and wondrous, and this place has both in equal measure. What's more, it smells of...<sniiiiiiiiiiiiff>...knowledge!

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: I should certainly hope so! Sharlayan is known as a great seat of knowledge, and the Studium is the foremost of its many academies.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: It is our honor and privilege to encourage the scholarly pursuits of students and faculty both, their shared insights giving rise to heretofore unseen disciplines and fields of study.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: That sounds absolutely fascinating! Oh, please, sir! May I attend this academic meeting of yours?

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Hahaha, by all means. The more the merrier, I say.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Thank you, Scholarch Montichaigne. I will inform the relevant parties of his attendance, and see to it he has clearance to enter Labyrinthos.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Thank you, my dear. 'Tis clear Searchingway is a kindred spirit with a passion for learning, and I could not very well deny him the opportunity to sate his curiosity.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you, sir! Thank you!

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: We haven't much time until proceedings get underway. Let's get going, shall we?

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Absolutely amazing! I've most certainly come to the right place!

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: I trust the proceedings were to your liking?

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, it was magnificent! There's so much we Loporrits have yet to see of Etheirys. So much to learn!

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Earlier you mentioned how they create new disciplines by sharing. Does this mean you plan to have all these people working together in future?

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: I do indeed. That is precisely why I suggested this meeting of minds in the first place. The exchange of knowledge and ideas will invariably lead to ever greater discoveries.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: But how exactly do you plan to combine their fields? They seem entirely unrelated to me...

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Any thoughts? Given all you've seen, I imagine you must have an idea or two as to how to further advance their work.

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: They could find a new use for Labyrinthos.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: They could explore the sea of stars!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: They could explore the great unknowns of the universe!

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Having abandoned our plans of exodus, Labyrinthos does want for purpose. That I cannot deny.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: That is certainly a possibility. Perhaps it is indeed time we turned our gaze heavensward.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: Oho, you've touched on the very heart of learning, my friend. The desire to conquer the unknown is the first step to all great discoveries. And I daresay there is no greater unknown than the great expanse!

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Well said, Scholarch Montichaigne!

dialogue.name: TLAQATIA
dialogue.text: We too have been giving thought as to what our combined efforts might accomplish.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: It occurred to me that, by applying Professor T'laqa's research on aetheric currents to the data obtained via my starlens, it may be possible to discover other stars capable of supporting life.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: And we needn't stop there. Thanks to the work done here in Labyrinthos, we know travel to other stars is possible. With sufficient stores of Mervynbread, we could surely weather the journey, however long it may be.

dialogue.name: RURUSHA
dialogue.text: A marvelous idea! The Golden Dhyata should prove useful should we require the translation of foreign languages we may encounter there among the stars.

dialogue.name: HINAGESHI
dialogue.text: And if we can communicate with those we encounter, then we would be able to share our cultures with them! You can leave that part to Professor Tankin and me.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: With you all working together, your chances of encountering heretofore undiscovered intelligent life are better than good, I'd say!

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: But what would you say if you met them?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I'd tell them about hope.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I'd tell them about what Meteion was searching for.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: That's it!

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Meteion was sent out to explore the stars, and search for the meaning of life... Sadly, her fruitless quest led her to the very depths of despair.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: But you could do things differently. You could go and spread the word that hope yet lives on.

dialogue.name: MONTICHAIGNE
dialogue.text: A most admirable endeavor. And who better than we to see it through? After all, not even the Final Days could extinguish the flame of life on this star.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Scholarch Montichaigne should arrive shortly.

dialogue.name: SEARCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Worry not─I will do my very, very best to convince this Monty-chain to allow my attendance.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: That was brilliant! Part of me is glad it's finally over, though. Organizing everything was no mean feat.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: More importantly, I can't quite believe that your offhand suggestion has effectively created an entirely new academic field.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: But I suppose if anyone should be taken seriously on the subject of seeking out the unknown, then it is you.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: It's rather exciting to think I might someday help in the exploration of the stars.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: At any rate, thank you for everything, Forename.

dialogue.name: QIHALIAPOH
dialogue.text: ...Oh, but wait! Where is Searchingway!? I still need to rub those adorable little ears of his!
